title: Is a ‘Soft Launch’ Right for Your Relationship?
description: A term used by businesses to slowly roll out products has been adopted by couples who want to avoid putting their relationship under the microscope of social media.
dc:creator: Laura Pitcher
media:description: For some couples who want to avoid judgment on social media, the soft launch, similar to a company slowly revealing a new product, has become a popular way to discreetly share a new relationship.
